synopsis:
Grougaloragran, a mysterious and ancient entity, appears one with a baby carriage. After defeating a mysterious foe with powers over time, who wants Grougaloragran's life force, or "Wakfu", Grougaloragran comes across Alibert, who is quitting his profession as a bounty hunter after almost taking a innocent man to jail. Grougaloragran leaves the baby carriage with Alibert, believing that he will be a good father to the baby inside. He also leaves a message for the adoptive father, along with a baby Tofu (Bird).
12 years later, Alibert has opened an inn and established a small town. The boy, now called Yugo, believes himself to be a ordinary boy until he discovers that he has the ability to create portals. He puts it to the test when a monster rampages though town, ending up at his Inn. Ruel, who was passing though town, teams up with Yugo and defeats the beast, which turns out to have been a Iop possessed by a demon trapped in an item, in this case a sword known as a Shushu. Alibert, seeing Yugo's power, decides to tell him the truth: that he is adopted and that his real family is out there somewhere.

It is twelve years since the newborn baby Yugo was entrusted to Alibert the bounty hunter. Since then, Yugo and his adopted father run the quiet inn of Bouftou Croustillant in Emelka. But the destiny of Yugo topples over when it discovers that it is able of opening portals of téléportation magicl...

Tristepin,  the Iop formerly possessed  by the Shushu, wakes up while the village is attacked by polters. He decides to form an alliance with Yugo and Ruel to try to find the source of problem. In the forbidden forest, they make the acquaintance of Amalia and Evangelyne who will join them in the search...

Having crossed the Zap portal, our young heroes decide to go to the closest village to buy supplies. Unfortunately, they soon discover that the village is continuously attacked by a diabolic being called the Black Raven. Our young heroes are going to have to surpass themselves to put an end to this threat...

Our 5 heroes head towards the island of Oma, but Tristepin falls stupidly in a hellish trap: he is prisoner of a bewitched tower and of her inhabitants, a horrible band of seedy princesses. If Yugo and the friends do not show imagination, Tristepin risks ending up as the delightful Princes of fairy tales: transformed into toad!

Our heroes cross a village of Flaqueux, fearful and weak creatures are being oppressed by a horde of Taures who are as strong as they are stupid. Unable to let go this injustice, Yugo persuades the friends to teach the Flaqueux to defend themselves...

The magical map of our heroes is definite: the way towards the island of Oma passes by the market town of Katrepat, a gloomy village the inhabitants of which do not know joy and good mood. Very quickly, Yugo and the friends discover that the village is in the shadow of the terrible count Vampyro. Our heroes are going to do everything to compromise his blacks designs...

Poisoned by a diabolic rose, a living flower with lethal venom, Amalia is taken swiftly to Eniripsa in a very close village. The faith healer puts our heroes on the path of an antidote, but to get it, Yugo is going to have to confront a particularly harebrained and crafty old Sadida …

Once again misled, our heroes arrive at "Chtibrout", a village of bakers where they make the acquaintance of Xav the Baker. This baker is getting ready for the annual tournament of the Best Bread! Unfortunately, the participants do not all believe in "fair play" and Xav was already subjected to some low blows before the competition, Yugo offers to help Xav by becoming his assistant!

On the road for the island of Oma, Yugo and the friends cross a harbinger who warns them that there is a clever thief in the region. This puts Ruel in a state of panic. The rest of the team does not seem to understand why very well...

Arriving at Bonta, Yugo and his friends have to buy a boat to go on the island of Oma. But with the Kamas they have, they cannot even afford a small boat. Ruel has an idea, the final of the 8th division of Boufbowl taking place right now in Bonta, an unique chance to allow them trip to the island of Oma..

Participating in the finals of Boufbowl, Yugo and his friends play with the old team of Ruel, Réal Boitard. But the opposing team, named Bouftons Rouges says Ruel is washed up. The more minutes pass and the more the chances to win diminish...

Change of tactics. Ruel decides to make use of the substitutes. Yugo, Amalia and Evangelyne enter the game, in spite of their inexperience to Boufbowl. However, Yugo remains optimistic: they have confronted much worse as adversaries since the beginning of their adventure but red Bouftons do not think the same...

Having bought the boat with the kamas they earned in Bonta, Yugo and his friends go finally on the island of Oma. Only, it would seem that there is a stowaway on board of the ship, a passenger with willful intentions...

In the course of their trip at sea, the five friends encounter a terrible tempest and their boat is wrecked on an island. Yugo, Amalia and Evangelyne disembark in search of food, but primitive Sadida take them in hostage: these are Kaniboules! And it seems that they have the poor habit to give the foreigners in sacrifice in their godhead: big Moon... This smells bad for our heroes!

Amalia, Tristepin and Evangélyne wake up on a tiny islet. The boat was attacked by a mythical living being, Kralamoure Géant, and sank into the abyss. By way of islet, there is a huge and green island protected by an ancient fate of invisibility. The mysterious island of Oma where there should be the true family of Yugo.

Yugo continues his exploration of the island of Oma with Adamaï, his brother dragon. During this time, by surveying the caverns, the companions discover the ruins of a very ancient temple kept by a terrible dragon! Stopping at nothing, the Grouilleux de Nox heads to the island!

The battle between the dragon Grougaloragran and Nox rages. Having been sent to the ice of the big North, Yugo and his friends wait for the end of this ultimate battle, feeling tension because it is the World of Twelve that is at stake!

Grougaloragram failed... Our friends have to be divided into two groups: on one hand, Ruel, Tristepin, Amalia and Evangelyne set off towards the kingdom Sadida to tell them about the threat which Nox represents, on the other Yugo and Adamaï which go looking for the Dofus in which Grougaloragran is going to reincarnate...

Since the departure of Amalia, the kingdom Sadida changed. The king is away and it is therefore Armand de Sheran Sharm, the brother of Amalia who governs the kingdom. During this time, Yugo and his brother Adamaï are still in search of the Dofus of Grouraloragran, but they do not know that Nox sent a formidable enemy in their wake...

The king Sadida is in the sanctum of the Tree of life, heart of the Kingdom Sadida which is mysteriously sick. Overstepping the ban of the prince Armand, Amalia and Evangelyne go to the King to tell it about the imminent attack of the Kingdom by Nox. But things do not turn out as they had envisaged it... During this time, Ruel searches a means to get away from the prison cell into which he was unfairly thrown...

Yugo and his brother Adamaï arrive on the famous island where Grougaloragran would have hidden the Dofus. Wanting to know about it more on his powers of Eliatrope, Yugo launches into a crossing of the Desert. But It would seem that the hunter of Nox, Igôle, has arrived on the island.

Having hurt Evangelyne by employing from Rubilax in the Kingdom Sadida, our Iop finishes his escape in the desert and goes looking for the tomb of his ancient Master: Goultard. To his surprise, Goultard is not dead.  Our Iop brain is going to discover how to become a true Shushu Guardian... He has to confront Rubilax and make him fear him.

Yugo and Adamaï reach the goal of their trip finally: the secret shrine in which Grougaloragran hid his Dofus. There, they make the acquaintance of the guardian of the Dofus. But Igôle did not die, contrary to what our heroes thought...

The kingdom Sadida is on the brink of war, getting ready for the unavoidable attack of Nox. It is necessary to prevent  the clock of Xélor from teleporting to the island at all costs. Amalia and Evangelyne wait without hoping too much for the return of their companions...

Nox and his troops land on the island. The Xélor attacks without deferring more from the purpose of his crusade: Wakfu contained in the Tree of Life. But the heart of the kingdom Sadida is protected by the colossal plant wall of the protective trees. Also the The Brotherhood of Tofu is in pursuit... Together, they well intend to hold the line.
